Agnes Mary Leo

  1. Foster Name: Agnes
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Mitlowski
  3. Foster Family: Albert and Rosa Micloski
  4. Foster Family Alt: Mitlowski
  5. Location of Family: Beatrice, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  7. Arrival Place: Beatrice, NE
  8. Age on Arrival: 2
  9. Date of Birth: 1911-07-08, New York City, NY
  10. Date of Death: 2002-05-07, Ashland, NE
  11. Gender: female
  12. Married Name: Agnes Stander
  13. Spouse Name: Robert Stander
  14. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Rosie McGuire Corres.; Ashland Gazette, n.d. (obit.); Eloise Thomsen Corres.
